Package org.hibernate.search.mapper.pojo.mapping.definition.programmatic

Interface TypeMappingIndexedStep

  • public interface TypeMappingIndexedStep
    The step in a mapping definition where a type's indexing can be configured more precisely.

    • Method Summary

        backendName - The name of the backend.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.
        See Also:

      • index

        TypeMappingIndexedStep index​(String indexName)
        Parameters:
        indexName - The name of the index.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.
        See Also:
        Indexed.index()

      • enabled

        TypeMappingIndexedStep enabled​(boolean enabled)
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to map the type to an index (the default), false to disable the mapping to an index. Useful to disable indexing when subclassing an indexed type.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.
        See Also:
        Indexed.enabled()

      • routingBinder

        TypeMappingIndexedStep routingBinder​(RoutingBinder binder)
        Parameters:
        binder - A RoutingBinder responsible for creating a bridge.
        Returns:
        this, for method chaining.
        See Also:
        Indexed.routingBinder()
